name: Stockhawk
tagline: Android application to Access real-time stock information to stay on top of the market.
body:
### Project 3 - Udacity Android Nanodegree

# Introduction
Android application build using Yahoo Finance API and hosted on Google Play Store. Displays stock information including a graph with zoom capabilities supporting English, Arabic (RTL) and Hindi language. Application is accessible to sight-impaired users using Google Talkback and also includes a widget.

## Feature List

* Supports English, Hindi, and Arabic Language with RTL support.
* Displays a graph with zoom capabilities.
* Also includes a widget which helps you track stocks from your home page.
* Talkback support for sight-impaired users.
